.default-container{background-color:#fff!important}html{display:unset;font-size:13px}.show-for-desktop,.show-for-extrasmall,.show-for-large,.show-for-mobile,.show-for-tablet{display:none}@media only screen and (min-width:100px){.responsive-width{width:100vw}html{font-size:8px}}@media only screen and (min-width:100px) and (max-width:325px){.responsive-width{width:97vw}html{font-size:8px}.show-for-extrasmall{display:unset}.hide-for-extrasmall{display:none}}@media only screen and (min-width:325px) and (max-width:600px){.responsive-width{width:95vw}html{font-size:10px}.show-for-mobile{display:unset}.hide-for-mobile{display:none}}@media only screen and (min-width:600px) and (max-width:1250px){.responsive-width{width:96vw}html{font-size:12px}.show-for-tablet{display:unset}.hide-for-tablet{display:none}}@media only screen and (min-width:1250px) and (max-width:2000px){.responsive-width{width:1250px}html{font-size:14px}.show-for-desktop{display:unset}.hide-for-desktop{display:none}}@media only screen and (min-width:2000px){.responsive-width{width:1250px}html{font-size:15px}.show-for-large{display:unset}.hide-for-large{display:none}}@keyframes fade-in{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes bounce{0%,to{transform:translateY(0)}50%{transform:translateY(-8px)}}@keyframes rotate{0%{transform:rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn)}}@keyframes pulse{0%{transform:scale(1)}50%{transform:scale(1.26)}to{transform:scale(1)}}@keyframes color-change{0%{fill:red;color:red}25%{fill:#1e90ff;color:#1e90ff}75%{fill:#32cd32;color:#32cd32}to{fill:red;color:red}}@keyframes intro-shifting-x{0%,to{opacity:0;transform:translateX(10vw)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}}@keyframes intro-shifting-y{0%,to{opacity:0;transform:translateY(-50vw)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}@keyframes outro-shifting-x{0%,to{opacity:1;transform:translateX(0)}to{opacity:0;transform:translateX(100vw)}}@font-face{font-family:Circle;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__WAJbe2Q4__) format("opentype")}@font-face{font-family:Circle-Alt-Bold;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__KZgxYp80__) format("opentype")}@font-face{font-family:Circle-Alt-ExtraBold;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__flFn3tSh__) format("opentype")}@font-face{font-family:Circle-ExtraBold;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__PFG4hsvD__) format("opentype")}@font-face{font-family:Circle-ExtraLight;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__3MmVZvlv__) format("opentype")}@font-face{font-family:Circle-Light;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET___X4NV3Yw__) format("opentype")}@font-face{font-family:Circle-Thin;font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:url(__VITE_ASSET__F8sl7hDB__) format("opentype")}#default-layout.container{border-radius:1.5rem;gap:3rem;margin-top:2rem}#default-layout.container header{align-items:center;animation-duration:1s;animation-fill-mode:forwards;animation-name:fade-in;background-color:#fff;box-shadow:0 1px 3px #d7d2c1,0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.24);display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:flex-end;min-height:12rem;overflow:hidden;width:100%}#default-layout.container header section{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:.1rem;margin-top:1.5rem}#default-layout.container header section>*{align-items:center;color:#0b1623!important;display:flex;width:100%}#default-layout.container header section .wrapper-area{flex-direction:row-reverse;gap:2rem;height:2rem}#default-layout.container header section .wrapper-area a{color:#0b1623!important;font-size:1.1rem}#default-layout.container header section .main-area{gap:2rem;height:6rem}#default-layout.container header section .main-area .brand-area{align-items:center;color:unset!important;display:flex;font-size:2rem}#default-layout.container header section .main-area .brand-area span{text-transform:uppercase}#default-layout.container header section .main-area .search-area{align-items:center;background-color:#f5f4ef;border-radius:.8rem;color:#807451;display:flex;height:40px;padding:0 20px;width:90%}#default-layout.container header section .main-area .auth-area{display:flex;gap:1.5rem}#default-layout.container header section .main-area .auth-area a{align-items:center;color:unset!important;display:flex;gap:.2rem;white-space:nowrap}#default-layout.container header section .navigation-area{align-items:center!important;display:flex;justify-content:center!important;margin-top:1.2rem}#default-layout.container header section .navigation-area nav{align-items:center;display:flex;font-size:1.1rem;justify-content:space-between;width:100%}#default-layout.container main{border-radius:1rem;min-height:70vh;overflow:hidden}#default-layout.container footer{background-color:#0b1623;box-shadow:0 1px 3px #d7d2c1,0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.24);color:#f9c092;min-height:30rem;width:100%}
